translations: n．公报，官方报纸：通常由政府出版，用于发布法律、法规、公告等官方信息的报纸。

sentences.sentence: He tried the various almanacs, annuals and gazettes which were held in the library.
sentences.translation: 他试着在图书馆里找过各种历书、年鉴和报纸。

sentences.sentence: Patent gazettes and indexes, classifications and other literature in this field are also available.
sentences.translation: 在这里还可以获得专利公报和索引、分类和其他这个领域的文献。
